TopicTitle: When KSP2 is officially cancelled can the KSP1 link be placed above the KSP2 links?

Articles.Content:
KSP2 was/is a disaster as a game, for the player base, and for science education in general.

Can we move the KSP2 forum links below the KSP1 forum links as KSP1 is still a good product and has all the players? People will only be coming here for KSP1 anyway very soon.

I'd replace the title with if instead of when 

Regardless, I'd be in favor of it if the worst does come to pass.

3 hours ago, K33N said:

KSP2 was/is a disaster as a game, for the player base, and for science education in general.

Can we move the KSP2 forum links below the KSP1 forum links as KSP1 is still a good product and has all the players? People will only be coming here for KSP1 anyway very soon.

It wasn't officially cancelled that's just the prevailing theory on what's happening

17 hours ago, K33N said:

KSP2 was/is a disaster as a game, for the player base, and for science education in general.

Can we move the KSP2 forum links below the KSP1 forum links as KSP1 is still a good product and has all the players? People will only be coming here for KSP1 anyway very soon.

Lol, TRUTH!

 

13 hours ago, Ryaja said:

It wasn't officially cancelled that's just the prevailing theory on what's happening

Yes, just like gravity and relativity are also "theories." Mark my words, KSP2 is cancelled. No ifs ands, or buts. I know peolpe are saying we should give all viewpoints a chance and have a nice discussion about it, but when one "theory" is on the level of the geocentric model of the solar system, you are allowed to say, no, thats krakens, the sun in the middle, and KSP2 is cancelled!

I think that's a great idea.  There are barely any mods for KSP2 anyway and it's unlikely anyone will be putting out much with the game being cancelled without being finished.

Edited May 3 by Jcklemme

95% approval rating on steam.. recent reviews too. That brings a twinkle to Jebs eyes.. or no that was just the exhaust fumes.

But still brings me joy to see KSP1 stand for so long

11 hours ago, Meecrob said:

Mark my words, KSP2 is cancelled. No ifs ands, or buts. 

Okay bet, mark my words, the game is not canceled. 
 

The one who is correct gets to tell the other I told you so.

19 hours ago, Meecrob said:

Lol, TRUTH!

 

Yes, just like gravity and relativity are also "theories." Mark my words, KSP2 is cancelled. No ifs ands, or buts. I know peolpe are saying we should give all viewpoints a chance and have a nice discussion about it, but when one "theory" is on the level of the geocentric model of the solar system, you are allowed to say, no, thats krakens, the sun in the middle, and KSP2 is cancelled!

You can't state that with any certainty or authority though. You know precisely as much as we do, not much concrete at all. People are stating 'its cancelled', whereas Private Division are stating work is still ongoing. One of those two is true and by extension the other cannot be.
Let the corpse at least go cold, lol.  Why the hurry?

On 5/2/2024 at 2:39 AM, Ryaja said:

It wasn't officially cancelled that's just the prevailing theory on what's happening

I thought the prevailing theory was rushed release of whatever unfinished assets they have lying around, then no further development

If it does get cancelled, and these forum links get demoted below KSP1, can we also get these forum links a ghost emoji/graphic next to them, and rename them "The Ghost of KSP2"? 
It could have its own theme of ghostly white Kerbal faces. You could mod them into the game, even. Have some fun with the fact its a dead game.
Seems like a complete waste to still have KSP2 at the top of the forum page.
Yeah I agree, this should be tucked away out of sight.

31 minutes ago, DVQuill said:

Seems like a complete waste to still have KSP2 at the top of the forum page.

Please, pretty please, with a cherry on top?

To the tune of "We Built This City" by "Starship"

Corporation games

Built this forum
We built this forum on K, S, P

'Cause we're the ship of fools
Looking out for number 2

I'll put this up for a vote at the end of this week.
If it's up for internal debate ....ouch.

On 6/17/2024 at 4:03 PM, Dakota said:

I'll put this up for a vote at the end of this week.

Looking forward to this and hoping it is broadcast clearly across the entire forum. If KSP is prioritized over the sequel I hope we can change the forum logo back to the original rather than KSP2's.

Let the corpse at least go cold, lol.  Why the hurry?

Boy, little did I know.

I'll put this up for a vote at the end of this week.

@Dakota I don't think this has been posted yet. Really hoping we can make this happen before you and the team close up shop so that the forums stay as relevant as possible.

Btw, wishing you and all of IG the best of luck!

24 minutes ago, RileyHef said:

@Dakota I don't think this has been posted yet. Really hoping we can make this happen before you and the team close up shop so that the forums stay as relevant as possible.

Btw, wishing you and all of IG the best of luck!

I don't think he meant a public vote...

18 minutes ago, PDCWolf said:

I don't think he meant a public vote...

Well that would be a major disappointment. Obviously KSP2's team will have bias towards prioritizing their game on the forums. They also will cease to exist as a dev team after this week, so why should they decide?

I think the community should decide, especially considering how much more active the KSP1 forums already are compared to the sequel. KSP2 will only become more obscure and irrelevant given current events, so why prioritize that over the wealth of past, current, and future info that KSP1's forum will have?
